trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were 2 other sightings in Houston on or around May 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the morning of May 4th 2010 myself my daughter and my daughter viewed multiple rotating green and white and blue some blinked in and out of our sight range others appeared as mili second bright streaks that blinked out as quickly as they blinked in they were basically were streaking as they blinked in and out. Some of the lights were in the vicinity of Ellington air force base but they seemed to be swarming without an ordered flight direction. We watched them for about 20 minutes but we had to leave to get my daughter ready for school they were still swarming when we left.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: On the morning of may 4th between 5:35 & 5:55 myself and two others witness multiple UFOs.
